items.title: Intel Sustainability Website (React, Vite, Bootstrap)
items.description: I leveraged React, Vite, and Bootstrap to create a website mockup showcasing Intel's sustainability timeline, incorporating Arabic translation to demonstrate right-to-left (RTL) accessibility.

items.title: Flower Shop Website Redesign
items.description: I redesigned a flower shop’s website to transform a flat, text-heavy layout into a vibrant, community-focused experience. The update introduced clear visual hierarchy, responsive design, and a refreshed color palette. My additions to the layout include a seasonal offerings section and details highlighting the shop’s local charm. I also created a wordmark and favicon to enhance the shop’s brand identity.

items.title: Minders: Calendar and Task Manager
items.description: An in-development task management app for iOS and Apple Watch focused on ADHD-friendly feedback and overload reduction.

items.title: Roamway Travel Planner (iOS, Swift-native)
items.description: I am developing a smart, personal itinerary builder app for iOS and iPadOS, leveraging Apple's frameworks like MapKit and the Apple Intelligence Foundation Model.

items.title: Nevada EMPOWER Website (Express, React, TypeScript, SQL)
items.description: Working alongside one other developer, I migrated the entire frontend codebase to React and TypeScript, ensuring type safety and maintainability, and boosting developer velocity. I then drove a full design overhaul—realigning the site with brand standards, enhancing responsiveness, and improving accessibility.

items.title: Pandemic Travel Visualization Website (JQuery, Mapbox API)
items.description: I built an interactive web-based travel visualization tool using Mapbox to analyze 24 months of personal geolocation data, displaying key trends and revealing shifts in travel habits before and during pandemic-era restrictions. Disclaimer: This website was written with legacy technologies and is not mobile-friendly.

items.title: JS Hangman
items.description: I developed a Hangman game in JavaScript as my first personal project, later applying object-oriented programming principles and enhancing the site with responsive web design to improve usability across devices.
